code: import React from"react";import{useHistory}from"react-router-dom";import{Flex,Button,Table,TableEmptyState,TableErrorState,TableHeader,TableHeaderCell,TableBody,TableRow,TableCell}from"monday-ui-react-core";import"../App.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OrdersBoard=()=>{const history=useHistory();const homepage=()=>history.push("/");const columns=[{id:"item",title:"Item",width:180,loadingStateType:"medium-text"},{id:"salesAssociate",title:"Sales Associate",width:200,loadingStateType:"long-text"},{id:"scentProfiles",title:"Scent Profiles",width:200,loadingStateType:"medium-text"}];const data=[{id:1,item:"Pine",salesAssociate:"Zack",scentProfiles:"Pine, Mint, Grass"},{id:2,item:"Spring",salesAssociate:"Zack",scentProfiles:"Flowers, Breeze, Trees"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"Back",onClick:homepage,children:"Back to Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Table,{style:{width:"auto"},size:Table.sizes.MEDIUM,columns:columns,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableHeader,{children:columns.map((headerCell,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableHeaderCell,{title:headerCell.title,icon:headerCell.icon,infoContent:headerCell.infoContent},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableBody,{children:data.map(rowItem=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableRow,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:rowItem.sentOn}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:rowItem.subject})]},rowItem.id))})]})]})});};export default OrdersBoard;
